text: @GavinNewsom Yet you Don’t warm The Black Community Of CDC findings!  If you truly cared about the black Community you would be sharing warning them of the higher risk for #COVID19 , you will be held accountable if one more Black dies of C19 in California!  @pnjaban @TheJusticeDept @HHSGov
